data.eml:eml: Diplogyniidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) associated with Panesthia cockroaches (Blattodea: Blaberidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Seeman, Owen D. (2012): Diplogyniidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) associated with Panesthia cockroaches (Blattodea: Blaberidae). Zootaxa 3163: 33-53, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211770
